text: Amnon Krauz, Hebrew: אמנון קראו , (born August 10, 1952 in Petah Tikva) is a former Israeli swimmer. Krauz participated in the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City but wasn't able to obtain a medal. == Other websites == * www.sports-reference.com Category:1952 births Category:Jewish Israeli sportspeople Category:Living people Category:Olympians for Israel Category:People from Petah Tikva Category:Swimmers
title: Amnon Krauz
